amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for NASA minority university research and education programs by $8.1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 3 in the Congressional Record of April 23, 1997, to restore funding for Minority Research and Education Programs to FY 1997 funding levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 226 (Roll no. 91).
